Detector module

class Detector.Green_detector

Bases: object

This Class can be used to recognise the biggest coherent green dot in the Image. Can be used as a test instead of the person tracker

detect()

Returns the coordinates of the biggest coherent green dot in the Image. Can be used as a test instead of the person tracker

Parameters:

image – input image to be analyzed

Returns:

Dictionary with position of tracked object and image size

class Detector.PersonDetectorYoloV3(yoloConfig='yolov3.cfg', yoloWeights='yolov3.weights', yoloClasses='coco.names')
